title: 2 FPS AFTER WINDOWS 10 LATEST UPDATE?
body:
Hello guys, I have a problem with LoL or windows 10 latest update. It was 10/6/16 after I shutdown my pc and updated the new windows 10 client, I started my LoL client, ready to play a LoL match, and once I entered a game, I GOT 2 FPS?????????? THE WHOLE GAME, I had to go afk and let my team upset. I am so upset right now, and I don't know if its my new windows 10 update  or its my LoL game? because, before the new windows 10 update, I usually got 20 fps and 15. But now I cant play at all :/. If anyone can help pls contact my email --snip--


My username is -snip-


Thank you ;) 
Btw my main is nidalee{{champion:76}}  :D

replies.body: I've snipped out your username and email, as having it posted on a public venue can be a security risk to your account.  The issue you're having may be due to a recent windows update that auto enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  The bar has not been interacting well with league and causing fps and freezing problems.  Disabling that should fix you up!
Btw I didn't work for me :/ I still have 2 fps
OMG I DIDNT KNOW ty so much for snipping
